mapper.select: select count(1) as cnt from ${msg_table} where MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '0' and COALESCE(RSRT_DDTI,CURRENT TIMESTAMP) <= CURRENT TIMESTAMP and SNDG_DDTI is null and MSG_DCD = '${msg_type}' and BIZ_MSG_DCD = 'AT' and GROUP_NO is null
mapper.update: update ${msg_table} set MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '1', GROUP_NO = '${group_no}' where MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '0' and COALESCE(RSRT_DDTI,CURRENT TIMESTAMP) <= CURRENT TIMESTAMP and SNDG_DDTI is null and MSG_DCD = '${msg_type}' and BIZ_MSG_DCD = 'AT' and GROUP_NO is null fetch first 1000 rows only
mapper.select: select trim(DATA_ID) as DATA_ID, trim(case when BIZ_MSG_DCD is null or BIZ_MSG_DCD = '' then 'PH' else BIZ_MSG_DCD end) as message_type, CHTR_MSG_CNTS as msg_txt, CHTR_MSG_CNTS as sms_txt, trim((case when RCPT_TEL like '82%' then RCPT_TEL when RCPT_TEL like '010%' then '82' || substr(rcpt_tel, 2, 15) else '82' || substr(rcpt_tel, 2, 15) end)) as call_to, trim(TRNS_PR_TEL) as call_from, CHTR_MSG_TITL as msg_txt_title, 'D' as pcom, CASE WHEN CHARACTER_LENGTH(CHTR_MSG_CNTS) >= 90 THEN 'L' ELSE 'S' END AS smskind, TO_CHAR(current timestamp, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as curr_date, BUTN_INFO as btn_1, TMPL_CD_CNTS as template_cd, trim(SEND_PR_PROF) as profile_key, COALESCE(TO_CHAR(RSRT_DDTI, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), '00000000000000') as snd_dttm from ${msg_table} where MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '1' and GROUP_NO = '${group_no}' and MSG_DCD = '${msg_type}'
mapper.update: update ${msg_table} set MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '2', SNDG_DDTI = CURRENT TIMESTAMP where MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '1' and GROUP_NO = '${group_no}' and MSG_DCD = '${msg_type}'
update ${msg_table} set MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '0', GROUP_NO = NULL, SNDG_DDTI = NULL where MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '1' and GROUP_NO = '${group_no}' and MSG_DCD = '${msg_type}'

update ${msg_table} set MSG_SNDG_STTS_CD = '${status}', MSG_ERR_CD = '${msg_err_code}', AGAN_TEL_INFO_CD = '${agan_tel_info}', SNDG_CPEE_DDTI = TIMESTAMP('${sndg_cpee_dt}'), AGAN_CTDO_TYPE = '${agan_sms_type}', AGAN_SNDG_RSLT_CD = '${agan_code}' where DATA_ID = '${msgid}'
mapper.insert: insert into ${log_table} select * from ${msg_table} where DATA_ID = '${msgid}'
